main event: A witness observed a circular light in the sky changing colors from red to white for about 10 minutes in Adamsville, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and tapering at the edges., The colors of the light changed rapidly but in a regular alternating pattern between red and white., The object appeared to be hovering without any maneuvers or movement., The witness was a high school junior who regularly studies astronomy., The object was estimated to be about 2 to 4 miles away from the observer.
witness description: high school student (junior) from Edwardsburg, Michigan
